original_text: And Hadad found great favor in the sight of Pharaoh, so that he gave him in marriage the sister of his own wife, the sister of Tahpenes the queen.
korean_text: 하닷이 바로의 눈 앞에 크게 은총을 얻었으므로 바로가 자기의 처제 곧 왕비 다브네스의 아우를 그의 아내로 삼으매

sentences.original_text: And Hadad found great favor in the sight of Pharaoh,
sentences.korean_translation: 하닷은 바로의 눈에 크게 은총을 입었으니

sentences.original_text: so that he gave him in marriage
the sister of his own wife,
the sister of Tahpenes the queen.
